STATE v. TARLETON No. COA06-760 Court of Appeals of North Carolina Filed April 17, 2007 Certification Date May 7, 2007 Appeal from Union (04CRS50819, 04CRS50820, 04CRS50822, 04CRS50823, 04CRS50824, 04CRS50825, 04CRS50826, 04CRS50834, 04CRS50835, 04CRS50836).

Cases reported without published opinion. No prejudicial error.
